name: Sergeant Barich
Lore: 'Wakeelmui native. Former employee of Sienar Fleet Systems missile division. Stormtrooper biker scout with dreams of transferring to 181st Imperial Fighter Group.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to power of anything he pilots (or 3 to any speeder bike). When in a battle with your other biker scout, may draw one battle destiny and subtract that amount from opponent''s attrition and total power.',
